title: 10 Incredible Snapchat Filters for Halloween 2020
description: Want to send some delightfully terrifying snaps? Looking for a creepy filter for your next Zoom call? Here are 10 Halloween themed Snapchat lenses you can try.
intro: Want to send some delightfully terrifying snaps? Looking for a creepy filter for your next Zoom call? Here are 10 Halloween themed Snapchat lenses you can try. All these lenses are compatible with Snap Camera so you can use them on Zoom calls! Just copy the link to the filter and paste it in the search bar in Snap Camera.

filters.name: abomination
filters.author: Jericho Oneill
filters.description: If you are looking for the "lab experiment gone wrong" look, this filter was made for you. Jericho also has a ton of other filters that would be perfect for Halloween, so be sure to check out his profile.

filters.name: MY-DARK-DREAMSx4
filters.author: jp pirie
filters.description: JP is a master of creepy and disturbing lenses. The blank eyes and empty mouth make this clown lens particularly terrifying. If this filter doesn't quite suit your fancy, I'm positive he's made something that will.

filters.name: Spider Eyes
filters.author: Ben
filters.description: If you are looking for something a little more subtle, then you might want to try out this lens from Ben.

filters.name: Candy Face
filters.author: CyreneQ
filters.description: Got a sweet tooth? Cyrene's Candy Face filter should satisfy it! I mean, who wouldn't want a face made out of candy?

filters.name: Frail
filters.author: RÍ™hÍ™oÍ™nÍ™dÍ™aÍ™
filters.description: Nothing like a pale, disembodied head to add some spookiness to your Zoom calls! Rhonda definitely nailed that Halloween spirit with this filter.

filters.name: SOLAR SYSTEM
filters.author: emily <3
filters.description: Add an out-of-this-world look with Emily's Solar System lens! And if I'm not mistaken, Pluto is still included despite its demotion.

filters.name: Ghost
filters.author: Marky Mark
filters.description: Haunt your friends or coworkers with "Ghost" by Marky Mark. Before you get your hopes up I don't think it's from Mark Wahlberg, but it's still a cool filter.

filters.name: Witch
filters.author: Roman Jaquez
filters.description: Maybe you are in the mood to cast a spell on someone. This filter won't help you turn someone into a frog, but it'll sure make you look like you can.

filters.name: cute leopard
filters.author: tyleeseeuh
filters.description: Not everyone is into creepy and scary for Halloween. Here's a cute filter to help connect you with your feline side.

filters.name: Vampire
filters.author: Nikki Avail ðŸŒ™
filters.description: Can you even have Halloween without vampires? Just make sure you stay away from garlic while using this one.

filters.name: Bonus - Corrupt Cyborg
filters.author: Jonah Cohn
filters.description: I know the list says 10, but here's a bonus lens. Get that glitchy cyborg effect I know you've always dreamed of.
